title: TODAY Bernstein Nabors to Discuss 100 Days 100 Projects Report on Recovery Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 27, 2009

 



TODAY Bernstein Nabors to Discuss 100 Days 100 Projects Report on Recovery Act




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of Media Affairs  --------------------------------------------  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                 May 27, 2009   TODAY: Bernstein, Nabors to Discuss "100 Days, 100 Projects" Report on Recovery Act WASHINGTON – Chief Economic Advisor to the Vice President Jared Bernstein and OMB Deputy Director Rob Nabors will hold a conference call with reporters TODAY, Wednesday, May 27, to discuss the "100 Days, 100 Projects" report the President will release today that offers a snapshot of Recovery Act projects already underway across the country just 100 days into this two-year program.  The call will take place at 4:00 p.m. EDT.  An RSVP is required to participate. WHAT:           OMB Deputy Director Rob Nabors and Chief Economic Advisor to the Vice President    Jared Bernstein WHEN:           TODAY, Wednesday, May 27, at 4:00 p.m. EDT HOW:             To receive dial-in information, please RSVP to media_affairs@who.eop.gov  # #
